properties.title: Resources - Other Struts-Related Articles - Jakarta Struts

section.name: Other Struts-Related Articles
section.p:
Expresso Extends Struts through Integration Roadmap
- http://www.jcorporate.com/html/products/expresso.html
- http://www.jcorporate.com/doc/roadmap.html

Dynamic Value Object by raffaele spazzoli
- http://www.theserverside.com/patterns/thread.jsp?thread_id=2722

Coarse Grained BMP beans with Dependent Value Objects by Floyd Marinescu
- http://www.theserverside.com/patterns/depbmp.jsp

Ruby Web Application Framework - A framework for developing web/wap applications founded in the Ruby programming language, based on the Jakarta Struts project.
- http://sourceforge.net/projects/ruby-waf/

Building Web Applications in Java - by Brad Cox
- http://virtualschool.edu/wap/index.html
- overview of article: http://www.mail-archive.com/struts-user%40jakarta.apache.org/msg08555.html
Doclet your Servlet by Jeremy Roschelle
You make the decision (JSP/Struts or Velocity/Turbine) by Jon Stevens.

Get disconnected with CachedRowSet by Taylor G. Cowan
- http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-02-2001/jw-0202-cachedrow.html

Incremental development with Ant and JUnit by Malcolm Davis
- http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/library/j-ant/?dwzone=java

p.b: A MVC Framework from Kevin Duffy

section.p:
Encapsulate reusable functionality in JSP by Simon Brown
http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-08-2000/jw-0811-jsptags.html

Solve your servlet-based presentation problems by Kevin Unger
- http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-11-2000/jw-1103-presentation_p.html

Understanding JavaServer Pages Model 2 architecture by Govind Seshadri
The Problem with JSP by Jason Hunter
